An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: Undercover blond
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U0gdWX

by Anonymous

Rey was never the patient one, so when the silence after the battle of Crait is prolonged, she decides to spy on Kylo Ren on Starkiller.

What happenes when Kylo has the similar idea?

—

How hard could it be? she thought to herself. She needed a good wig and to keep a low profile. Not rocket science. She could gather some intel, rumors, maybe get a glimpse at Kylo Ren himself. Not that she would go looking for him. Too risky even with the Force disguise. But maybe from afar… no, no what was she thinking? Of course it wasn’t about him or their relationship, because there was no relationship at all.

Words: 3875, Chapters: ½, Language: English

summary: LEGO Star Wars New Visual Dictionary Reveals The Included Minifigure...
title: LEGO Star Wars New Visual Dictionary Reveals The Included Minifigure...
body:
We’re probably on the fourth or fifth iteration of this visual set and Minifigure which is up for pre-order now: http://bit.ly/LEGOswvd 

The books if you’ve never had one, provides an overview for Star Wars LEGO sets, features and minifigs. Each book has came (just about) with an included  minifig. Well this time it’s Finn in his bacta jump suit.

Here’s the blurb:

Explore the LEGO® Star Wars™ galaxy with this visual guide to the minifigures, vehicles, and sets from the entire Star Wars saga. Discover every detail of the Millennium Falcon, look around the Death Star, examine Poe Dameron’s X-wing starfighter, and find out about all your favorite LEGO Star Warsminifigures-from Rey to Darth Vader. Learn how the awesome sets are created in the Beyond the Brick chapter, which features concept art and an interview with the LEGO Star Wars creative team.

Pre order it now for a April release http://bit.ly/LEGOswvd

title: Beta reader wanted
body:
Hey people !

I’m looking for a beta reader for my Star Wars fanfic, with OC has a main character, First Order side, polyamourous relationship, Stormpilot, angst and fluff, multiple chapters and a lot of other things so you can contact me if your interested to know more details ! I’m looking for someone to check gramar and typos (I’m not an native english speaker) but also someone who would advise me on dialogue and characterization

Thank you !

summary: Commander Cody One of the Clone Army's most accomplished soldiers, Commander Cody worked especially well with Jedi Master...
caption:
Commander Cody
One of the Clone Army’s most accomplished soldiers, Commander Cody worked especially well with Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi. There was a genuine rapport between the two as they engaged in various dangerous campaigns. This special camaraderie vanished, of course, after Darth Sidious issued the infamous Order 66, which turned all the clone fighters against their masters. Unable to resist this new directive, Cody ordered his troops to fire on Obi-Wan, who barely escaped with his life.
